titleStmt.title: A sermon at the funeral of the Worshipful John Symonds, late of Great Yeldham in the county of Essex, Esq. preached in the parish-church of Great Yeldham aforesaid on the 24th of February, 1692, by John Brooke ... ; with a short account of his life.
titleStmt.author: Brooke, John, 1633 or 4-1716?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
